title: The Perfect hero
creator_credit: Barbara Doran, Kent Martin and ONF | NFB
brief_description: An insider’s look at the business of romantic fiction writing at Harlequin Publishing. Writers, editors, designers and the male models who pose for the book covers discuss their own roles and the expectations of the readers. Readers discuss the appeal of the romantic genre, and argue its literary merit. Features interviews with writers Barbara Cartland, Virginia Henley and Heather Graham.
